title: Practical Competency Strengthening Course through Quality Information Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic quality management concepts and relevant work experience
context.additional_context: A course training language professionals in learning methods using quality control information, structured around diagnostic and interactive information utilization techniques.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze Quality Cost Information (QCI) to write a work process diagnostic report
Learners can participate in interactive discussions deriving improvement strategies by combining peer feedback and QCI data
Learners can achieve over 85% engagement by developing interactive learning strategies based on diagnostic information.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
